document.discussion_title: Top 10 most beautiful Chinese athletes in Rio | 4-Traders
document.topic_text: As we watch the intense Olympic competition in Rio unfold, we must not underestimate the beauty that shines from within the female athletes themselves. Here is a list of the 10 most beautiful female athletes competing for China . They bring great honor to the country as well as to the literal beauty of sports. Born in 1992, Shu Siyao is a group rhythmic gymnast. [Photo/ Weibo ] Born in 1989, Sun Wenyan is a competitor in synchronized swimming. She won a silver medal in team competition at the 2012 Summer Olympics.[Photo/ Weibo ] Specializing in the pole vault, Li Ling won the gold medal at the Asian Indoor Championships in Doha this year with a height of 4.70 meters, breaking her own Asian record. [Photo/ Weibo ] Famous trampoline athlete He Wenna has one gold medal and one bronze medal from the Beijing and London Olympics . [Photo/ Weibo ] Tennis player Wang Qiang has won ten singles and one doubles title on the ITF tour. In 2015, she was ranked 82nd in the world. [Photo/ Weibo ] Zhang Yue is the goalkeeper of the Chinese women's national football team. However, as the back-up for Zhao Linan , most of her time in the Rio Olympics has been spent on the bench. [Photo/ Weibo ] Famous Chinese diver He Zi specializes in the 1 meter springboard, 3 meter springboard and 3 meter synchronized dives. Right after she won silver in the 3m springboard dive in the Rio Olympics , she received and accepted a marriage proposal from boyfriend and fellow diver Qin Kai . [Photo/ Weibo ] Hui Ruoqi is a volleyball player on the Chinese national team. China won gold for women's volleyball at the Rio Olympics . [Photo/ Weibo ] Zhao Linan is the goalkeeper of Chinese women's national football team. Even though she was invited to be a professional model, she rejected because she thought playing football was more prestigious. [Photo/ Weibo ] Born in 1996, Liu Xiang is a swimmer who won the bronze medal in the 50-meter backstroke at the 2015 World Aquatics Championships in Kazan, Russia . Due to her excellent appearance, she was named "The First Beauty of Swimming." [Photo/ Weibo ] (c) 2016 China Daily Information Company. All Rights Reserved. Provided by SyndiGate Media Inc. (Syndigate.info)., source Middle East & North African Newspapers
